parse.title: Epic Scenes from The Silmarillion after the mythology of J. R. R. Tolkien (Complete)

wikitext.*:
[[File:Complete Silmarillion Artwork.jpg|thumb|Artwork from the box set. By permission of Ted Nasmith]]
Complete box set of demo recordings of composer [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s operatic adaptation of ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' recorded by Volante Opera Productions between 2017 and 2023.  In June 2023 this set was released as a ten disc box set with a 128 page booklet containing a full synopsis, complete texts, translations of the Elvish and a guide to this version of the legends.

It includes the works  ''[[Fëanor, Op. 46 (Opera)|Op. 46 - Fëanor]]'', ''[[Beren and Lúthien, Op. 47 (Opera)|Op. 47. Beren and Lúthien]]'', ''[[The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Opera)|Op. 48 - The Children of Húrin]],'' ''[[The Fall of Gondolin, Op.49 (Opera)|Op. 49 - The Fall of Gondolin]]'' and ''[[The War of Wrath, Op. 71 (Opera)|Op. 71. The War of Wrath]].''
